help.LONG:
Windows Hosts Manager
Manage your Windows 'hosts' file from WSL in a safe, scriptable way.

Usage:
  winhost [options] <domain> [ip] ["note"]

Options:
  -a, --add       Add a new host entry (supports custom IP and inline comment)
  -r, --remove    Remove an existing host entry
  -l, --list      List all managed host entries
  -h, --help      Show this help message

Examples:
  winhost --add myproject.domain                        # Adds with default IP
  winhost --add myproject.domain "My local project"     # Adds with comment
  winhost --add myproject.domain 192.168.0.1            # Adds with custom IP
  winhost --add myproject.domain "Staging" 192.168.0.5  # Adds with comment and IP
  winhost --remove myproject.domain                     # Removes entry
  winhost --list                                        # Lists all entries
help.SHORT:
Usage: winhost [options] <domain> [ip]
Options: -a (add), -r (remove), -h (help), -l (list) 
Example: winhost -a myproject.domain
         winhost -r myproject.domain
         winhost -l
         winhost -h

For more details, use --help
